title: Royal Drama Ensues After Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Step Back | David Alan Grier
itunes:title: Royal Drama Ensues After Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Step Back | David Alan Grier
description:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle work to redefine their roles, President Trump aims a tweet in Farsi at Iranian protesters, and David Alan Grier discusses "A Soldier's Play."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
